title: 018 - Our Host Celebrates His Birthday
description: On today's episode of The Pod, the guys help Tony celebrate his birthday and they also have a special guest call in to help them celebrate as well. The guys also cover the Final Four of the March Sadness tournament, as tournament Cinderella SDDEO looks to continue its improbable run to a National Title and take down some incredibly strong teams. The guys also discuss some of the viral memes that were going around this weekend, dive into whether or not meditation works, and Zito's almost deadly experience while driving this weekend. Look for the voting for the Final Four to be released later this week. Stay safe out there, and enjoy.
